mapper.select: SELECT c.`carpp`, c.`carxinghao`, c.`carno`, c.`driver`, c.`driverphone`, c.`carguishu`, c.`fadongjiid`, c.`jszlostdate`, c.`ranyoutype`, c.`kid` FROM carinfo c INNER JOIN kehu k ON k.kid=c.kid INNER JOIN fadongji f ON f.fadongjiid=c.fadongjiid and carno like '%${carno}%'
SELECT a.bzid,a.bzname,a.bztype,a.bzcost,b.guzhanginfo,b.guzhangyuanyin FROM banzu a INNER JOIN weixiurecord b ON a.bzid=b.bzid
SELECT b.`bzid`,b.`bzname`,b.`bzstatus`,SUM(s.`ticheng`) AS ticheng FROM `banzu` b INNER JOIN `jigong` j ON b.`bzid`=j.`bzid` INNER JOIN `star` s ON s.`sid`=j.`sid` GROUP BY `bzid`
mapper.update: UPDATE weixiurecord SET status = #{status},bztime=#{bztime} WHERE recordid = #{recordid};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM jgrecord ORDER BY shijidate DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) zicount FROM jgrecord WHERE recordid=#{recordid} AND jgstatus=2
SELECT * FROM user WHERE rid=6 and ustatus=0
mapper.update: UPDATE kache SET kastatus = 1 WHERE kano = #{kano};
mapper.select: SELECT p.`proid`,p.`proname`,p.`propp`,p.`pronum`,p.`prodw` ,p.`proprice`,g.`ghaddress`,g.`ghname`,p.`prostar`,p.`ghid` FROM product p INNER JOIN gonghuo g ON p.`ghid`=g.`ghid` WHERE p.`prostar`=0 and p.`pronum`>0

SELECT b.`bzid`,b.`bzname`,w.`jiuyuanfy`,SUM(s.`ticheng`) AS ticheng FROM `banzu` b INNER JOIN `jigong` j ON b.`bzid`=j.`bzid` INNER JOIN `star` s ON s.`sid`=j.`sid` INNER JOIN `weixiurecord` w ON w.`bzid`=b.`bzid` WHERE w.`recordid`=#{recordid} GROUP BY `bzid`
